meaningMnemonic: I’ll give you this <radical>bright</radical> <radical>plate</radical> if you agree to an <kanji>alliance</kanji> with me. I know you like things that are bright, and I know you like plates too. Therefore, this bright plate should be more than enough to convince you to enter into an alliance with me.
readingMnemonic: The person you are trying to get in an <kanji>alliance</kanji> with you is the captain of the <reading>May</reading>flower (めい). You want to be in an alliance with the captain of the Mayflower because you really like boats. You want to ride on the Mayflower like, so bad.
